languages.text: "Мы искали, звали, смотрели — но видели лишь пустоту и эхо эха большой беды. Бессчетные дни миновали, прежде чем я оказалась на Лилэтан и нашла там нескольких сородичей — беглецов, чудом добравшихся до мира наших предков. Но их рассказ едва ли был плодом желанной истины. Те, кто готов был говорить со мной — а таковых было мало, ибо в глазах их я была блудной дочерью, отринувшей достойные Пути — лепетали о страшной болезни, что растеклась черными нитями боли по путям {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контура бесконечности{/g}, умерщвляя мир целыми сегментами. Те, кто выжил — бежали в страхе и скитались меж звезд, пока теплый свет Лилэтан не позвал некоторых из них".

traits.locale_text: "Мы искали, звали, смотрели — но видели лишь пустоту и эхо эха большой беды. Бессчетные дни миновали, прежде чем я оказалась на Лилэтан и нашла там нескольких сородичей — беглецов, чудом добравшихся до мира наших предков. Но их рассказ едва ли был плодом желанной истины. Те, кто готов был говорить со мной — а таковых было мало, ибо в глазах их я была блудной дочерью, отринувшей достойные Пути — лепетали о страшной болезни, что растеклась черными нитями боли по путям {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контура бесконечности{/g}, умерщвляя мир целыми сегментами. Те, кто выжил — бежали в страхе и скитались меж звезд, пока теплый свет Лилэтан не позвал некоторых из них".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."
languages.original_text: "Мы искали, звали, смотрели — но видели лишь пустоту и эхо эха большой беды. Бессчетные дни миновали, прежде чем я оказалась на Лилэтан и нашла там нескольких сородичей — беглецов, чудом добравшихся до мира наших предков. Но их рассказ едва ли был плодом желанной истины. Те, кто готов был говорить со мной — а таковых было мало, ибо в глазах их я была блудной дочерью, отринувшей достойные Пути — лепетали о страшной болезни, что растеклась черными нитями боли по путям {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контура бесконечности{/g}, умерщвляя мир целыми сегментами. Те, кто выжил — бежали в страхе и скитались меж звезд, пока теплый свет Лилэтан не позвал некоторых из них".

traits.locale_text: "We searched, called out, looked everywhere — but saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on Lilaethan and met some of my kin — the refugees who barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly desired. Those who agreed to talk to me were few, because most saw me as a prodigal daughter that spurned the honorable Paths, and would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the Eternal cycle and mortified the world one segment after another. The ones who survived ran away in fear and wandered between the stars until Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们到处寻找、呼唤。我们找遍了每个角落，但只看到了虚无，听到了灾难的回响。不知过了多久，我到了莉莱赞，找到了我的一部分族人。那些人死里逃生，抵达了我们的先祖曾居住过的行星，而他们告诉我的事情，并不是我渴望寻求的真理果实。几乎没人愿意与我交谈，因为绝大多数人都把我视作叛逆的姑娘，认为抛弃了光荣的道途。那些人不停地谈论着某种可怕的疾病，这种疾病在{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}的路径上散布着象征痛苦的黑色触手，让我们的世界一个接一个地死亡。幸存下来的族人在恐惧中不断逃亡，在群星之间徘徊，直到莉莱赞温暖的光芒照在了其中一部分人身上。”
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: “我们到处寻找、呼唤。我们找遍了每个角落，但只看到了虚无，听到了灾难的回响。不知过了多久，我到了莉莱赞，找到了我的一部分族人。那些人死里逃生，抵达了我们的先祖曾居住过的行星，而他们告诉我的事情，并不是我渴望寻求的真理果实。几乎没人愿意与我交谈，因为绝大多数人都把我视作叛逆的姑娘，认为抛弃了光荣的道途。那些人不停地谈论着某种可怕的疾病，这种疾病在{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}的路径上散布着象征痛苦的黑色触手，让我们的世界一个接一个地死亡。幸存下来的族人在恐惧中不断逃亡，在群星之间徘徊，直到莉莱赞温暖的光芒照在了其中一部分人身上。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the Infinity Circuit and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

languages.text: «Buscamos, llamamos, rastreamos en todas las direcciones, pero solo encontramos el vacío y el eco de una calamidad. Pasó un sinfín de días hasta que me encontré en el Lilaethan y volví a ver a algunos de mis hermanos, los refugiados que a duras penas consiguieron llegar a nuestro planeta ancestral. Sus historias distaban mucho de ser la fruta de la verdad que tanto anhelaba. No muchos estaban dispuestos a hablar conmigo, pues la mayoría me consideraba una oveja negra que había rechazado las Sendas honorables... pero no dejaban de susurrar sobre una terrible enfermedad que esparcía negros apéndices de dolor por los caminos del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} y sofocaba nuestro mundo segmento a segmento. Los supervivientes huyeron aterrados y vagaron por las estrellas hasta que la cálida luz del Lilaethan alcanzó a algunos de ellos».
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: «Buscamos, llamamos, rastreamos en todas las direcciones, pero solo encontramos el vacío y el eco de una calamidad. Pasó un sinfín de días hasta que me encontré en el Lilaethan y volví a ver a algunos de mis hermanos, los refugiados que a duras penas consiguieron llegar a nuestro planeta ancestral. Sus historias distaban mucho de ser la fruta de la verdad que tanto anhelaba. No muchos estaban dispuestos a hablar conmigo, pues la mayoría me consideraba una oveja negra que había rechazado las Sendas honorables... pero no dejaban de susurrar sobre una terrible enfermedad que esparcía negros apéndices de dolor por los caminos del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} y sofocaba nuestro mundo segmento a segmento. Los supervivientes huyeron aterrados y vagaron por las estrellas hasta que la cálida luz del Lilaethan alcanzó a algunos de ellos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「探しても、呼びかけても、どこを探しても、虚しさと災いのこだましか見えなかった。数え切れないほどの日が過ぎ、我はリラエタンにたどり着き、かろうじて祖先の星に辿り着いた難民たちと出会った。彼らの話は、我が切望していた真実の果実とはほど遠いものだった。我と話すことに同意した者はごくわずかで、ほとんどの者は我を名誉ある道を踏み外した娘とみなしていた。そして彼らは、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}の道に黒き痛みの触手を広げ、惑星を次々と死滅させていく恐ろしき病について話し続けるばかりだった。生き残った者たちは恐怖のあまり逃げ惑い、リラエタンの暖かい光が届くまで、星々の間をさまよっていたのだ」
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: 「探しても、呼びかけても、どこを探しても、虚しさと災いのこだましか見えなかった。数え切れないほどの日が過ぎ、我はリラエタンにたどり着き、かろうじて祖先の星に辿り着いた難民たちと出会った。彼らの話は、我が切望していた真実の果実とはほど遠いものだった。我と話すことに同意した者はごくわずかで、ほとんどの者は我を名誉ある道を踏み外した娘とみなしていた。そして彼らは、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}の道に黒き痛みの触手を広げ、惑星を次々と死滅させていく恐ろしき病について話し続けるばかりだった。生き残った者たちは恐怖のあまり逃げ惑い、リラエタンの暖かい光が届くまで、星々の間をさまよっていたのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben gesucht, wir haben gerufen, wir haben überall nachgesehen, doch wir sahen nur Leere und das Echo eines Echos einer Katastrophe. Unzählige Tage vergingen, ehe ich mich auf der Welt der Lileath wiederfand und einem Teil meines Volkes begegnete — den Flüchtlingen, die mit Mühe und Not den Planeten unserer Ahnen erreicht hatten. Ihre Geschichten waren weit entfernt von der Frucht der Wahrheit, nach der ich mich so verzehrte. Nur wenige willigten ein, mit mir zu sprechen — denn die meisten sahen mich als abtrünnige Tochter, die den ehrenwerten Pfaden den Rücken zugekehrt hatte. Und diese wenigen redeten unaufhörlich von einer schrecklichen Krankheit, welche die Pfade der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} mit schwarzen Tentakeln der Schmerzen überzogen und unsere Welt Segment für Segment abgetötet habe. Die Überlebenden flohen verängstigt und irrten zwischen den Sternen umher, bis das warme Licht der Welt der Lileath einige von ihnen erreichte."
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben gesucht, wir haben gerufen, wir haben überall nachgesehen, doch wir sahen nur Leere und das Echo eines Echos einer Katastrophe. Unzählige Tage vergingen, ehe ich mich auf der Welt der Lileath wiederfand und einem Teil meines Volkes begegnete — den Flüchtlingen, die mit Mühe und Not den Planeten unserer Ahnen erreicht hatten. Nur wenige willigten ein, mit mir zu sprechen — denn die meisten sahen mich als abtrünnige Tochter, die den ehrenwerten Pfaden den Rücken zugekehrt hatte. Und diese wenigen redeten unaufhörlich von einer schrecklichen Krankheit, welche die Pfade der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} mit schwarzen Tentakeln der Schmerzen überzogen und unsere Welt Segment für Segment abgetötet habe. Die Überlebenden flohen verängstigt und irrten zwischen den Sternen umher, bis das warme Licht der Welt der Lileath einige von ihnen erreichte."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons cherché, appelé, regardé partout, mais nous n'avons trouvé que le néant et l'écho de l'écho d'une calamité. D'innombrables jours se sont écoulés avant que je gagne la lilaethan et retrouve certains de mes semblables, des réfugiés qui avaient réussi in extremis à atteindre notre planète ancestrale. Malheureusement, leurs récits n'ont pas suffi à étancher ma soif de vérité. La plupart ont refusé de me parler, car ils me considéraient comme une fille indocile qui avait rejeté les Voies honorables. Ceux qui ont bien voulu s'ouvrir à moi ne cessaient de mentionner une terrible maladie dont les vrilles noires avaient répandu la douleur sur les voies du {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} et tué notre monde segment par segment. Les survivants avaient fui de terreur et erré parmi les étoiles jusqu'à ce que la douce lumière de la lilaethan atteigne certains d'entre eux. »
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons cherché, appelé, regardé partout, mais nous n'avons trouvé que le néant et l'écho de l'écho d'une calamité. D'innombrables jours se sont écoulés avant que je gagne la lilaethan et retrouve certains de mes semblables, des réfugiés qui avaient réussi in extremis à atteindre notre planète ancestrale. Malheureusement, leurs récits n'ont pas suffi à étancher ma soif de vérité. La plupart ont refusé de me parler, car ils me considéraient comme une fille indocile qui avait rejeté les Voies honorables. Ceux qui ont bien voulu s'ouvrir à moi ne cessaient de mentionner une terrible maladie dont les vrilles noires avaient répandu la douleur sur les voies du {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} et tué notre monde segment par segment. Les survivants avaient fui de terreur et erré parmi les étoiles jusqu'à ce que la douce lumière de la lilaethan atteigne certains d'entre eux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aradık, haykırdık, her yere baktık ama tek bulduğumuz yokluktu, yankılanan bir musibetin yankısıydı. Yolumun Lilaethan'a düşerek soydaşlarımdan bazılarıyla kesişmesinden evvel sayısız gün geçti. O mülteciler, atalarımızın gezegenine güç bela ulaşmayı başarmışlardı. Anlattıkları hikâyeler, hasretini çektiğim hakikatin neticesi olmaktan çok uzaktı. Benimle konuşmayı kabul edenler pek azdı. Çünkü pek çoğu, beni onurlu Yolları reddeden asi bir kız olarak görüyordu. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre'nin{/g} yollarına acıyla bezenmiş kara filizler salarak dünyamızı parça parça ölüme mahkûm eden korkunç bir hastalıktan bahsedip duruyorlardı. Hayatta kalmayı başaranlar, korku içinde kaçarak yıldızların arasında gezinip durdu. Ta ki Lilaethan'ın sıcacık ışığı, aralarından bazılarına ulaşana dek..."
languages.original_text: "We searched, we called out, we looked everywhere, but we saw only emptiness and the echo of an echo of calamity. Countless days passed before I found myself on the Lilaethan and met some of my kin — those refugees who had barely managed to reach our ancestral planet. Their stories were far from being the fruit of truth I so badly craved. Those who agreed to talk to me were few — for most saw me as a wayward daughter who had spurned the honourable Paths — and they would not stop babbling about a terrible disease that spread black tendrils of pain over the paths of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} and deadened our world one segment after another. The ones who survived fled in fear and wandered between the stars until the Lilaethan's warm light reach out to some of them."

traits.locale_text: "Aradık, haykırdık, her yere baktık ama tek bulduğumuz yokluktu, yankılanan bir musibetin de yankısıydı o. Yolumun Lilaethan'a düşerek soydaşlarımdan bazılarıyla kesişmesinden evvel sayısız gün geçti. O mülteciler, atalarımızın gezegenine güç bela ulaşmayı başarmışlardı. Anlattıkları hikâyeler, hasretini çektiğim hakikatin neticesi olmaktan çok uzaktı. Benimle konuşmayı kabul edenler pek azdı. Çünkü pek çoğu, beni onurlu Yolları reddeden asi bir kız olarak görüyordu. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre{/g} Yollarına acıyla bezenmiş kara filizler salarak dünyamızı parça parça ölüme mahkûm eden korkunç bir hastalıktan bahsedip duruyorlardı. Hayatta kalmayı başaranlar, korku içinde kaçarak yıldızların arasında gezinip durdu. Ta ki Lilaethan'ın sıcacık ışığı, aralarından bazılarına ulaşana dek..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
